MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network on Ashcroft Drive and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:55pm on Monday, 29 March 2021
